summary: A dramatization of the early years of the hard rock band, Def Leppard, the group faces both success and personal tragedies such as drummer, Rick Allen losing his arm in a car accident and guitarist Steve Clark's alcohol addiction.
cast: Nick Bagnall|Karl Geary|Adam MacDonald|Esteban Powell|Orlando Seale|Tat Whalley|Dean McDermott|Amber Valletta|Anthony Michael Hall|Brett Watson|Danette Mackay|Matt Cooke|Larry Day|Emma Stevens|Ivan Smith|Peter Farbridge|Jean Nicolai|Mary Katherine Harvey|Nigel Harvey|John Dunn-Hill|Priscilla Mouzakiotis|Amy Sobol|Simon Peacock|Andrea Sadler|Jessica Hassoun|Victor Knight|Daniel Murphy|Christine Solomon|Barbara Bacci|Sébastien Boucher|Carl Crevier|Lorelei Shellist|Max Walker|Jennifer Rae Westley
title: Hysteria: The Def Leppard Story
